content.newsInsight: Xi's military purges just exposed China's nuclear anxiety, NYT reports. Everyone's focused on the power struggle. Wrong lens. When you purge nuclear commanders during global tensions, you're not consolidating power. You're admitting your deterrent might be theater.
content.patternInsight: You're still reading. That already puts you ahead.
content.intelligenceExample: Xi's nuclear purges, for example. We read that and our mind goes to: if your nuclear forces need purging, what percentage of your military capability is PowerPoint versus plutonium?
